channel.title: Wazihack on WAZIUP e.V
channel.description: Recent content in Wazihack on WAZIUP e.V

item.title: WAZIHack Ghana 2017
item.description: This event took place in iSpace the 24-25 February 2017. In Ghana, the participants were not very familiar with the Arduinos and LoRa. The format was modified and turned into an Introduction to IoT, the sample sensors, how to assemble the devices, etc.
